title: LOOKING FOR LIKEMINDED PEOPLE TO BE MY FRIEND!
body: MESSAGE ME IF UR INTERESTED TO BE MI FREND! THANKS GUIZ. I WOULD LOVE TO MEET MORE PEOPLE AND TALK TO OTHERS ABOUT LEAGUE OF LEGENDS! :D

replies.body: pls guys. I'm lonely :( i need friends :(
I wanted to be your friend, but you deemed we weren't like-minded enough :(.
I'll send in the goons, they'll take good care of you. :D

I wouldn't mind


except I blocked you
I wouldn't mind, half of my friends don't play league of legends anymore >.<
le friendshipz am magic le xdddd
